activities: Synovate collects personal data from and about individuals for use generally in connection with the operation of its business.  Such personal data may be used by Synovate to provide incentive, loyalty marketing, learning, travel, market research, or other goods or services to its clients.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
recoursemech: Synovate has agreed to cooperate with competent European Union Data Protection Authorities in the event of any unresolved complaints; for Switzerland:  the Federal Data Protection and Information Commission (FDPIC).
